short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for Clique users to post directly to groups as they browse

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make sharing with your Clique groups easy through the Clique extension. It allows you to quickly post what your browsing to any of your groups with just one click. Our extension automatically loads your personal group list so you can just check the box and share immediately.
